name: Aereon
description: The Gliding Pokémon. The currents it creates with its wings carry the soothing scent of fresh air, calming those around it.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: For damaging moves activated by this Pokémon with 15 max PP or more, they may roll the damage twice and choose either total.

abilities.name: Cloud Nine
abilities.description: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather-related abilities have no effect on the Pokémon that have them.
